attributes.action: Remove the United Kingdom from the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The eurovision song contest is heavily funded by the UK so why should the UK continue to enter the contest when all the voting is political; For example We only got points from Ireland and Malta. Sweden got points from Norway Finland Denmark etc.   So why should we continue to fund a competition we have no choice of winning

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
